== Appearance ==
Golden Sheep look like the sheep from the show, but have bright yellow skin and wool.

== Behavior ==
Golden sheep are passive creatures, despite the fact that they can steal objects from people.

== Power and Abilities ==
The Golden Sheep are powerful creatures that can take various items from any character's inventory, though she apparently cannot take props ([[CommuniKate]]'s [[Mirror]], [[Toby]]'s [[Glasses]] and [[Durango]]'s [[Hat]] she–µp did not take).
